lines.text: No one's gonna take her from me! Akane's mine! And she's engaged to me!
[Akane and Ranma fall out of the landmine cart]
Akane!
Is that the spring?
Now you can be cured Ranma!
No way Akane!
What?
I gotta blow it up!
Ranma no! Then you'll never be able to...
Hey! Didn't you just say that you liked me the way I am?
I do!
Well, that way that you are is the way- I-I gotta destroy it!
Ranma.
This is it Akane! All my remaining strength, everything I got in one all or nothing blast... NOW!
Hey! Don't you know that all work and no play makes Ryoga a dull boy?
What does he think this is, a vacation? There's still a lot of work to do before we can get out of here!
Hehe. Don't worry Akane. I can work hard enough for the both of us. Just you watch.
Akane! Kasumi! Answer me!
Hello father.
Kasumi! Oh, You're safe!
Of course.
Oh thank Heaven.
Hiya! Shampoo go take Ramen to Ranma! Is OK yes?
You lousy jerks! You'd better untie me right now! Let me go! Let me outta here! I'm gonna get you! I swear!
Guess they take that harem stuff pretty seriously.
You-who! Ranma honey! Perfect timing! Over here!
